title: Why Jordan Peterson, a Canadian Moderate, is hated for imagined Conservatism
description:
Most wealthy liberals live Puritan lives (gaining wealth) but preach a libertine lifestyle. Peterson lives a Puritan life (faithful to one wife, faithful to his children) and is excoriated for preaching his brand of Puritanism. 

Peterson's interview on BBC3 with Dodd exposed both men's view of how the world can be saved. There are competing views of Marxism, but beneath it all are worldviews and implicit religions. 

Peterson and Dodd https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/arts-and-ideas/id140685432 

The Sex and the City Lifestyle https://nypost.com/2018/06/02/dating-columnist-reveals-how-sex-and-the-city-ruined-her-life/ 

Quick to Listen https://www.christianitytoday.com/ct/podcasts/quick-to-listen/ 

Audio podcast version of this. http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/ and https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333

If you want to support this channel https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
